## Change log

### 1.0.3
* Dev - Added compatibility with LSX Videos
* Dev - Added compatibility with LSX Search

### 1.0.2
* Dev - Add template hook for Storefront
* Dev - Add template hook for WooCommerce

### 1.0.1
* Dev - LSX Sharing styles moved from LSX to LSX Sharing plugin

### 1.0.0
* First Version
